success.title: Completed
success.message: All done! Your images are ready.

partial.title: Some conversions failed
partial.message: Some images couldn't be converted. Please check the list for details.

duplicate.title: Duplicate images found
duplicate.message: Looks like those images were already in the list!

unsupported.title: Unsupported images found
unsupported.message: Some images weren’t added because their format isn’t supported.

empty.title: No image files found
empty.message: No images were found that can be loaded.
